name: Asana Dark Theme (textured background)
description:
Asana dark theme inspired by Trello.

Features:
- Custom dark background texture.
- Dark gray color scheme.
- Enhanced project description edit screen.
additional_info:
5/2/2019   - Update for recent changes from Asana regarding the new Page Toolbar.
6/10/2018 - Updated for recent changes from Asana to the top nav.
2/28/2018 - Fixed top nav font colors on certain screens/views.
2/18/2018 - Fixed font colors on top navigation bar for inbox and dashboard views.
1/22/2018 - Fixed font colors when default Asana background is selected.
12/4/2017 - Released some additional tweaks and fixes.
